entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 06:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
